channel.title: My Server: Recruiting
channel.description:
Hi, I'm recruiting people that are experienced/know a bit about java and could help me make a good pk server. Also, I ask if you could please have patience, although i'm a fast learner, I have a tendency of getting off topic. Please and Thanks.
Add my MSN if you would like to help me: stevenashrox@msn.com
P.S. - As I'm quitting real RuneScape, you will be payed 250k real RS GP and Gold-Crowned modship to my server. Remember, I need someone who is good and can get the job done, I only need 1 person though. And don't try and take the job just because you want the GP, do it because you are kind enough to help.

item.title: My Server: Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @Yogosun Yogosun
item.description:
@Yogosun wrote:

I would be happy to help though I’m not on 24/7

Read full topic
